channel.title: 1. Prerequisites :: Container Registry Security with Vulnerability Scanning and Policy Enforcement
channel.description: Before starting this workshop, you’ll need to install and configure several essential tools that will help you interact with AWS services and Kubernetes clusters. These tools form the foundation for working with containers and AWS resources, especially Amazon EKS. AWS CLI The AWS Command Line Interface (CLI) is a unified tool that allows you to manage AWS services from your terminal. You’ll use it to configure your AWS credentials, create and manage AWS resources, and interact with various AWS services throughout this workshop.
